name: Cervical Chair Dr. G.
descr:
Specifications: 48/63 in height range with oval seat and back rest.

See video introduction here

See video presentation here

Height adjustable chrome base. Seat can be unlocked to rotate and improve working position. The chair back rest with lumbar support, can be put down. Developed and designed for the elegant and specific examination and adjusting for a modern and up to date looking practice enviroment. Design and functionality have been the driving force behing this project, which as led to a global succes. 

Chiroform adjusting instrument i designed by Peter Gyrst, DC. The Cervical Chairs, Pelvic Bench, Knee Chest and Pediatric Table have all been tested by GSOC. The Gonstead Doctors have found the concept in the new design, including patient comfort and Doctors improved working position, so execellent that they have given it a straight A.

As much aswe care of our patients spine and nervous system you have to take core of your own spine. The new instruments no only gives the patient the optimum comfort but also makes your working position less stressful.
